name: Papa's Ice Cream Shop
description:
Serve Customers Fast! This is an awesome “Ice Breaker” and “Speed & Serve” Arcade-Style Games
. Create & Serve Dozens of Delicious & Unique Ice Cream out of Your Own Ice Cream Shop .
--> Decorate and Update your Ice Cream as you like.

Here's the scoop, your ice cream shop is waiting and it's time to make some fantastic ice cream to serve to your customers! Arcade-style games will keep you on your toes, timing you as you make different kinds of ice cream and serve your customers quickly. Make sure you get the order right!
